sentences.english: Melva kisses another guy in front of her boyfriend justifying it to herself as an eye for an eye.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔瓦在男友面前亲吻另一个男孩，自以为报复。

sentences.english: Megeve ski station started its season early thanks to the recent snowfalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近的降雪已拉开了梅杰夫滑雪站的赛季。

sentences.english: After he bail mei after of reproach know blamed may explain beginning splendor.
sentences.chinese: 玥保释梅后责备之，后经荣解释始知错怪梅。

sentences.english: The appellation of Saint-Estèphe is the most northerly of the six village appellations of the Médoc.
sentences.chinese: 圣爱斯泰产区是梅多克地区六个产区中最北部的一个。
我是阿尔法，我是哦梅戛。

sentences.english: He was the duke of Saxe-Meiningen.
sentences.chinese: 那是德国的梅宁根公爵。

sentences.english: Can't you and I strike out for ourselves, May?
sentences.chinese: 难道你我不能走自己的路吗，梅？

sentences.english: The federal government was able to defeat the Métis in both clashes.
sentences.chinese: 在两次冲突中，联邦政府都成功以失败了梅蒂斯人。

sentences.english: They are taling in front of May's house.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在梅的房子前面谈话。

sentences.english: Maecenas himself wrote both prose and verse, but only fragments survive.
sentences.chinese: 梅塞纳斯自己也写散文与诗歌，但仅有断片传世。

sentences.english: By using only may know abundant propaganda, to plead Christine.
sentences.chinese: 浚知丰只利用梅宣传，向婷求情。

sentences.english: Mapplethorpe's photographs were first put on display in New York.
sentences.chinese: 梅普尔索普的照片首次在纽约展出。

sentences.english: The elder judge finally decided that either Sara or May would get the position.
sentences.chinese: 年长的评审官最后决定当选者要么是萨拉，要么是梅。

sentences.english: President Medvedev also called for tough punishment against officers who will abuse their position.
sentences.chinese: 梅德奥杰夫亦对滥用职权的官员予以重罚。

sentences.english: This was in north central Oklahoma near Medford.
sentences.chinese: 这是俄克拉荷马中北部的梅德福附近。

sentences.english: I soon learned that Mable began every day this way.
sentences.chinese: 不久，我知道梅布尔的每一天都是这样开始的。
